# NEW Features

- LoRaWAN wireless connectivity
- -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range
- IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
- Battery life up till 5 years@25°C, 15mins interval setting
- Easy to deploy and maintain

RoHS COMPLIANT 2002/95/EC

# Introduction

EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor. The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable, IP67 rating design with -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range. It is capable to measure temperature at different kinds of applications, such as refrigerator, freezer, cooling pipe, etc. With its wide range, high penetration rate LoRa connectivity, the data transmission range can be up till hundred or thousand meters away. EVA-2311 can be installed directly on the walls, metal box or poles. EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years based on certain conditions.

retrieved_contexts:
PJ85775
# ±0.5ᵒC Digital Temperature Sensor with Digital Interface

# In a SOP8/MSOP-8 Package

# GENERAL DESCRIPTION

The PJ85775 is a digital temperature sensor with ±0.5 °C accuracy. Temperature data can be read out directly via digital interface (compatible with SMBus, I²C or 2-wire) by MCU, Bluetooth Chip or SoC chip.

# FEATURES

- Operation Voltage: 1.75 V to 5.5 V
- Average Quiescent Current: 3.0 uA (Typ.) at 1.0 con/s
- Standby Current: 1.0 uA (Typ.)
- Temperature Accuracy without calibration:
- ±0.5 °C from 0 °C to 50 °C
- ±1.0 °C from -20 °C to 85 °C
- ±1.5 °C from -40 °C to 125 °C
- 12 bit ADC for 0.0625 °C resolution

detailed_results.question: What is the temperature measurement accuracy of the Banner S15S sensor?
detailed_results.generated_answer: The provided excerpts do not specify the temperature measurement accuracy of the Banner S15S sensor. For accurate information regarding the sensor's accuracy, it is recommended to refer to the product's technical specifications or the manufacturer's documentation.
detailed_results.ground_truth: The temperature accuracy of the Banner S15S is ±0.8°C (-40°C to 0°C), ±0.7°C (0°C to +60°C), and ±1.3°C (+60°C to +85°C).
detailed_results.expected_response: The Banner S15S sensor has a temperature accuracy of ±0.8°C from -40°C to 0°C, ±0.7°C from 0°C to +60°C, and ±1.3°C from +60°C to +85°C.
detailed_results.expected_contexts: Excerpt 1 : Temperature Accuracy: -40°C to 0°C: ±0.8°C (±1.5°F), Excerpt 2 : Temperature Accuracy: 0°C to +60°C: ±0.7°C (±1°F), Excerpt 3 : Temperature Accuracy: +60°C to +85°C: ±1.3°C (±2.2°F), Excerpt 4 : Temperature Measuring Range: -40°C to +85°C (-40 °F to +185 °F), Excerpt 5 : Temperature Resolution: 0.1°C

S15S Temperature and Humidity Sensor

# Features

The Temperature and Temperature/Humidity Sensor works in a variety of environments to provide temperature and humidity measurements.

- Connects via RS485 Modbus® registers
- Rugged overmolded design
- Ships with aluminum grill filter cap
- Optional stainless steel 10 μm sintered filter available separately

# Models

| Model Number | Function                                          | Control                | Connector                                                  |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| S15S-TH-MQ   | Female connector: Temperature and humidity sensor | Male connector: Modbus | Integral 4-pin M12 male/female quick-disconnect connectors |

# Configuration Instructions

# SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software

| Sensor Address | Description      | I/O Range                    | Holding Register Registration |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| 40001          | Humidity (%RH)   | Min Value: 0 Max Value: 100% | Min (Dec): 0 Max (Dec): 10000 |
| 40002          | Temperature (°C) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40003          | Temperature (°F) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40004          | Dew Point (°C)   |                              |                               |
| 40005          | Dew Point (°F)   |                              |                               |

The temperature = (Modbus register value) ÷ 20. The humidity = (Holding register value) ÷ 100. The dew point = (Holding register value) ÷ 100.

# COMs Settings

| Sensor Address | Description | I/O Range                    | Comments | Default | Access |
| -------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------- | -------- | ------- | ------ |
| 40601          | Baud Rate   | 0 = 9.6k 1 = 19.2k 2 = 38.4k | 0 = None | 1       | RW     |
| 40602          | Parity      | 0 = None 1 = Odd 2 = Even    |          | 0       | RW     |

Continued on page 2

Banner's SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software offers an easy way to configure and demonstrate Banner Modbus devices. Users have full control of device configuration, the ability to visualize device data, and to demonstrate device features. The easy-to-use software provides a variety of tools and works with Banner Modbus devices.

- Allows for the configuration and demo of Banner Modbus devices
- Free to download and available on the Banner website at https://www.bannerengineering.com/sg/en/products/software/snap-signal-configuration-software.html
- Works on Microsoft® Windows® 7 and 10(1)
- BWA-UCT-900 cable required to connect PC-based SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software to Banner Modbus devices

detailed_results.question: What types of gases can the Bosch BME690 sensor detect?
detailed_results.generated_answer: The Bosch BME690 sensor is designed to detect various gases, including volatile organic compounds (VOCs) and other gases that may be present in the environment. However, for specific details on the types of gases it can detect, you would need to refer to the sensor's datasheet or technical specifications, as this information is not provided in the excerpt.
detailed_results.ground_truth: The Bosch BME690 can detect VOCs, VSCs, carbon monoxide, and hydrogen.
detailed_results.expected_response: The Bosch BME690 gas sensor can detect Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), volatile sulfur compounds (VSCs), and other gases like carbon monoxide and hydrogen.
detailed_results.expected_contexts: Excerpt 1 : The gas sensor can detect Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), volatile sulfur compounds (VSCs) and other gases such as carbon monoxide and hydrogen., Excerpt 2 : The BME690 is a metal oxide-based sensor that detects gases by adsorption... The BME690 reacts to most volatile compounds., Excerpt 3 : The BME690 is capable of measuring the sum of VOCs/contaminants in the surrounding air., Excerpt 4 : In standard configuration, the presence of VSCs is being detected as indicator for e.g. bacteria growth., Excerpt 5 : Bad breath or spoiled food detection based on the measurement of volatile sulfur compounds, which are an indicator of bacteria growth.

detailed_results.question: What are some of the key outputs provided by the BSEC software for the BME690?
detailed_results.generated_answer:
The BSEC (Bosch Software Environmental Cluster) software for the BME690 provides several key outputs, including:

1. **Temperature**: Accurate measurement of ambient temperature.
2. **Humidity**: Measurement of relative humidity levels in the environment.
3. **Pressure**: Atmospheric pressure readings.
4. **Gas Concentrations**: Detection and quantification of various gases, such as volatile organic compounds (VOCs).
5. **Air Quality Index**: An overall assessment of air quality based on gas concentrations and environmental conditions.
6. **Altitude**: Calculation of altitude based on pressure readings.
7. **Environmental Context**: Information about the surrounding environment, which may include data on indoor/outdoor conditions.

These outputs can be used for various applications, including weather monitoring, indoor air quality assessment, and environmental sensing.
detailed_results.ground_truth: Key outputs of the BSEC software for the BME690 include Index for Air Quality (IAQ), CO2 equivalent (ppm), and b-VOC equivalent (ppm).
detailed_results.expected_response: The BSEC software for the BME690 provides several key outputs, including an Index for Air Quality (IAQ), bVOC-equivalents (ppm), CO2-equivalents (ppm), Gas scan result (%), and an Intensity level.

PJ85775
# ±0.5ᵒC Digital Temperature Sensor with Digital Interface

# In a SOP8/MSOP-8 Package

# GENERAL DESCRIPTION

The PJ85775 is a digital temperature sensor with ±0.5 °C accuracy. Temperature data can be read out directly via digital interface (compatible with SMBus, I²C or 2-wire) by MCU, Bluetooth Chip or SoC chip.

# FEATURES

- Operation Voltage: 1.75 V to 5.5 V
- Average Quiescent Current: 3.0 uA (Typ.) at 1.0 con/s
- Standby Current: 1.0 uA (Typ.)
- Temperature Accuracy without calibration:
- ±0.5 °C from 0 °C to 50 °C
- ±1.0 °C from -20 °C to 85 °C
- ±1.5 °C from -40 °C to 125 °C
- 12 bit ADC for 0.0625 °C resolution
- Compatible with SMBus, 2-wire and I²C interface
- Compatible industry LM75 with performance improved
- Programmable Over/Under Temperature
- Programmable Active Low or High for ALERT pin
- Support SMBus ALERT Response Address (ARA)
- Generate 32 different slave address by setup A0, A1, A2 pin
- Temperature Range: -40 °C to 125 °C

# APPLICATIONS

EVA‐2311          LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor

# NEW Features

- LoRaWAN wireless connectivity
- -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range
- IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
- Battery life up till 5 years@25°C, 15mins interval setting
- Easy to deploy and maintain

RoHS COMPLIANT 2002/95/EC

# Introduction

EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor. The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable, IP67 rating design with -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range. It is capable to measure temperature at different kinds of applications, such as refrigerator, freezer, cooling pipe, etc. With its wide range, high penetration rate LoRa connectivity, the data transmission range can be up till hundred or thousand meters away. EVA-2311 can be installed directly on the walls, metal box or poles. EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years based on certain conditions.

The PJ85775 is a digital temperature sensor with ±0.5 °C accuracy. Temperature data can be read out directly via digital interface (compatible with SMBus, I²C or 2-wire) by MCU, Bluetooth Chip or SoC chip.

# FEATURES

- Operation Voltage: 1.75 V to 5.5 V
- Average Quiescent Current: 3.0 uA (Typ.) at 1.0 con/s
- Standby Current: 1.0 uA (Typ.)

- Support SMBus ALERT Response Address (ARA)
- Generate 32 different slave address by setup A0, A1, A2 pin
- Temperature Range: -40 °C to 125 °C

- Portable Device
- Thermal Management

1. **Advantech EVA-2311**: The temperature range is -70°C to 200°C.
2. **PANJIT PJ85775**: The temperature range is not specified in the provided excerpts.
3. **YAGEO LS219**: The temperature range is -50°C to +150°C.
4. **Banner S15S**: The temperature range is not specified in the provided excerpts.
5. **Bosch BME690**: The temperature range is not specified in the provided excerpts.

Based on the available information, the **Advantech EVA-2311** offers the widest temperature detection range of **-70°C to 200°C**.

detailed_results.question: For monitoring a high-humidity industrial environment with potential water spray, which sensor would be most suitable based on the datasheets?
detailed_results.generated_answer:
Based on the provided datasheets, the **S15S Temperature and Humidity Sensor** would be the most suitable choice for monitoring a high-humidity industrial environment with potential water spray. 

Here are the reasons for this selection:

1. **Rugged Design**: The S15S sensor features a rugged overmolded design, which is likely to provide better protection against moisture and physical damage in harsh environments.

2. **Filter Cap**: It ships with an aluminum grill filter cap, which can help protect the sensor from water spray and debris. Additionally, there is an optional stainless steel 10 μm sintered filter available, which can further enhance its durability in wet conditions.

3. **Modbus Connectivity**: The sensor connects via RS485 Modbus® registers, making it suitable for integration into industrial monitoring systems.

4. **Temperature and Humidity Measurement**: It is specifically designed to provide accurate temperature and humidity measurements, which are critical for monitoring high-humidity environments.

In contrast, while the BME690 sensor also measures temperature and humidity, the S15S sensor's rugged features make it more appropriate for environments where water spray is a concern.
detailed_results.ground_truth: The Banner S15S is most suitable for a high-humidity industrial environment due to its high IP ratings (IP65/67/68) and rugged design.
detailed_results.expected_response: The Banner S15S would be the most suitable choice, as it offers IP65, IP67, and IP68 ratings, indicating it is well-protected against dust and water, and it is designed with a rugged overmolded body suitable for industrial settings.

# ±0.5ᵒC Digital Temperature Sensor with Digital Interface

# In a SOP8/MSOP-8 Package

# GENERAL DESCRIPTION

The PJ85775 is a digital temperature sensor with ±0.5 °C accuracy. Temperature data can be read out directly via digital interface (compatible with SMBus, I²C or 2-wire) by MCU, Bluetooth Chip or SoC chip.

# FEATURES

- Operation Voltage: 1.75 V to 5.5 V
- Average Quiescent Current: 3.0 uA (Typ.) at 1.0 con/s
- Standby Current: 1.0 uA (Typ.)
- Temperature Accuracy without calibration:
- ±0.5 °C from 0 °C to 50 °C
- ±1.0 °C from -20 °C to 85 °C
- ±1.5 °C from -40 °C to 125 °C
- 12 bit ADC for 0.0625 °C resolution
- Compatible with SMBus, 2-wire and I²C interface
- Compatible industry LM75 with performance improved
- Programmable Over/Under Temperature
- Programmable Active Low or High for ALERT pin
- Support SMBus ALERT Response Address (ARA)
- Generate 32 different slave address by setup A0, A1, A2 pin

EVA‐2311          LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor

# NEW Features

- LoRaWAN wireless connectivity
- -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range
- IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
- Battery life up till 5 years@25°C, 15mins interval setting
- Easy to deploy and maintain

RoHS COMPLIANT 2002/95/EC

# Introduction

EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor. The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable, IP67 rating design with -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range. It is capable to measure temperature at different kinds of applications, such as refrigerator, freezer, cooling pipe, etc. With its wide range, high penetration rate LoRa connectivity, the data transmission range can be up till hundred or thousand meters away. EVA-2311 can be installed directly on the walls, metal box or poles. EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years based on certain conditions.

PJ85775
# ±0.5ᵒC Digital Temperature Sensor with Digital Interface

# In a SOP8/MSOP-8 Package

# GENERAL DESCRIPTION

The PJ85775 is a digital temperature sensor with ±0.5 °C accuracy. Temperature data can be read out directly via digital interface (compatible with SMBus, I²C or 2-wire) by MCU, Bluetooth Chip or SoC chip.

# FEATURES

- Operation Voltage: 1.75 V to 5.5 V
- Average Quiescent Current: 3.0 uA (Typ.) at 1.0 con/s
- Standby Current: 1.0 uA (Typ.)
- Temperature Accuracy without calibration:
- ±0.5 °C from 0 °C to 50 °C
- ±1.0 °C from -20 °C to 85 °C
- ±1.5 °C from -40 °C to 125 °C
- 12 bit ADC for 0.0625 °C resolution
- Compatible with SMBus, 2-wire and I²C interface
- Compatible industry LM75 with performance improved
- Programmable Over/Under Temperature
- Programmable Active Low or High for ALERT pin
- Support SMBus ALERT Response Address (ARA)
- Generate 32 different slave address by setup A0, A1, A2 pin
- Temperature Range: -40 °C to 125 °C

# APPLICATIONS

detailed_results.question: For a long-term, low-power, battery-operated deployment, which would be a better choice between the BME690 and the EVA-2311?
detailed_results.generated_answer:
For a long-term, low-power, battery-operated deployment, the EVA-2311 would be the better choice. Here are the reasons:

1. **Battery Life**: The EVA-2311 has a battery life of up to 5 years at a 15-minute interval setting, which is ideal for long-term deployments. In contrast, the BME690's battery life is not specified in the provided information, making it difficult to assess its suitability for long-term use.

2. **LoRaWAN Connectivity**: The EVA-2311 features LoRaWAN wireless connectivity, which is designed for low-power, long-range communication. This is particularly beneficial for applications where devices are spread out over large areas.

3. **Temperature Range**: The EVA-2311 has a wide temperature detection range of -70°C to 200°C, making it versatile for various applications, including refrigeration and industrial environments.

4. **IP67 Rating**: The EVA-2311 is rated IP67, indicating it is dust-tight and can withstand immersion in water, which is advantageous for deployments in harsh environments.

Overall, the EVA-2311 is specifically designed for low-power, long-term applications, making it a more suitable choice compared to the BME690 based on the information provided.
detailed_results.ground_truth: The Advantech EVA-2311 is better for long-term battery deployment as it's a complete product with a 5-year battery life specification.
detailed_results.expected_response: The Advantech EVA-2311 is a better choice for a long-term, low-power deployment as it is a complete, self-contained unit with a specified battery life of up to 5 years. The BME690 is a component sensor that requires integration, and its power consumption, while low in ULP mode (50 µA), depends heavily on the specific use case and implementation.
detailed_results.expected_contexts: Excerpt 1 : EVA-2311: Battery life up till 5 years @25°C 15mins interval setting, Excerpt 2 : BME690 Current consumption: 50 µA at ULP mode for p/h/T & air quality, Excerpt 3 : EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor (a complete product)., Excerpt 4 : BME690 is a component sensor developed for mobile & connected applications., Excerpt 5 : BME690 power consumption can be up to 12mA in continuous mode.

EVA‐2311          LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor

# NEW Features

- LoRaWAN wireless connectivity
- -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range
- IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
- Battery life up till 5 years@25°C, 15mins interval setting
- Easy to deploy and maintain

RoHS COMPLIANT 2002/95/EC

# Introduction

EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor. The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable, IP67 rating design with -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range. It is capable to measure temperature at different kinds of applications, such as refrigerator, freezer, cooling pipe, etc. With its wide range, high penetration rate LoRa connectivity, the data transmission range can be up till hundred or thousand meters away. EVA-2311 can be installed directly on the walls, metal box or poles. EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years based on certain conditions.
